article_title: Sick-leave fight in Ohio shows what President Obama faces
article_text:

article_metadata.description: WASHINGTON — President Barack Obama’s push to provide seven days of paid sick leave to all U.S. workers would affect about 2.2 million Ohioans who don’t currently have that benefit.
